AD_Combat_Goblins_Caster_01.how_to_trigger: Fight S_FOR_Ambush_Goblins_Caster_01. AD triggered when taking a turn

PatrollingGoblin_AD_JoinOgreFight.synopsis: Goblin near the ogres joins the fight if player gets into combat with them.

AD_Combat_Goblins_Ranger_01.how_to_trigger: Fight S_FOR_Ambush_Goblins_Ranger_01. AD triggered when taking a turn

automatic_ordering.reasoning: Two of the sessions – AD_Combat_Goblins_Caster_01 and AD_Combat_Goblins_Ranger_01 – are both combat ambush dialogues triggered when the player takes a turn in an encounter against goblins. They use different encounter identifiers (one for a caster enemy, one for a ranger enemy) but are otherwise functionally similar and do not depend on one another; they may even happen in the same combat encounter if both enemy types are present, so there is no fixed order between them. On the other hand, the session PatrollingGoblin_AD_JoinOgreFight is described as involving a goblin who “joins the fight” when the player gets into combat with ogres. This indicates that its triggering condition (being involved in an ogre fight) is contextually different from that of the goblin ambush sessions. In a typical playthrough the ambush sessions (which are triggered when fighting goblins via their respective ambush identifiers) and the joining goblin session (which occurs when the player is engaged with ogres) would represent mutually exclusive branches of combat encounter. That is, if the player is in a goblin ambush encounter (triggering one or both of the ambush sessions), they would not be in the ogre fight where a patrolling goblin might join, and vice‐versa. Therefore, we consider that the PatrollingGoblin_AD_JoinOgreFight session is mutually exclusive with the two goblin ambush sessions. No definite ordering constraints between any of the provided sessions exist, aside from the fact that PatrollingGoblin_AD_JoinOgreFight logically follows the initiation of an ogre fight (which is not part of the provided data).

AD_Combat_Goblins_Caster_01_0.speaker: Goblin Booyahg
AD_Combat_Goblins_Caster_01_0.text: Gonna add your ears to my collection once you're dead!

PatrollingGoblin_AD_JoinOgreFight_0.speaker: Goblin Brawler
PatrollingGoblin_AD_JoinOgreFight_0.text: Oi! You fightin' them ogres, then you fightin' with me!

AD_Combat_Goblins_Ranger_01_0.speaker: Goblin Tracker
AD_Combat_Goblins_Ranger_01_0.text: You'll look good with a few arrows sticking out of your gut!
